text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar You know who didn't take the day off today? 

COViD-19
Gov. Cuomo
Doctors & Nurses
News People

People actually doing something positive to get us through this horrible situation.

Oh, and people cooking Trump's "hambergers".
